content.text: Hey, how is your day going?
Hey, it is going great. I am looking forward to moving on to the next chapter in my life. What about you?
My day is going well. I have fibromyalgia, so I need to stay warm this winter. I love to sing in my room when no one is around.
That's great to hear. I have never been in a relationship because I prefer to spend my time with my cars. I love taking my dog to the farmers market on the weekends.
I love animals. I would love to have lunch with Justin Bieber because he is my favorite singer and I would love to learn more about him and his music.
That would be awesome. I feel like my heart is beating in time with the rain. What do you do for a living?
I am retired and have a crummy job at Scrubway. I love to play video games all day.
That sounds like fun. I work as a personal trainer.
That sounds like a tough job.
It can be, but it is also very rewarding.
